contents:
反对第一名观点，根据美国心理协会官网数据，数据来源apa.org

Fact1: The suicide rate for Asian-Americans (6.10 per 10,000) is about half that of the national rate (11.5 per 10,000).

亚裔美国人自杀率低于美国平均值。

Fact2: Asian-American college students had a higher rate of suicidal thoughts than White college students but there is no national data about their rate of suicide deaths.

虽然亚裔美国大学在校生自杀想法比白人美国大学在校生高，但是并没有确定证据说明其自杀死亡的概率更高。
